alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:57AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Oklahoma and Canadian Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 157 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of El Reno, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, western Edmond, El Reno, Yukon, Bethany, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Nichols Hills, Calumet, Concho, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, Richland, The Capitol, Wiley Post Airport, The Fairgrounds, and Downtown Edmond. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 129 and 134. Interstate 40 between mile markers 112 and 149. Interstate 44 between mile markers 120 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
